to.sven.androidrccar.host.logic.impl

Interface ICyclicTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCyclicTask, BatteryPowerCyclicTask, LocationCyclicTask

    public interface ICyclicTask
    Interface for a cyclic task. It runs something in a given interval.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Is the cyclic task running?
      void setInterval(int interval)
      Sets the interval how often the task should be called.
      void start()
      Run the task in an given interval.
      void stop()
      Stop running cyclic task.

    • Method Detail

      • setInterval

        void setInterval(int interval)
        Sets the interval how often the task should be called. It can set at any time. If the task isRunning() the interval is set after the next run of the task.
        Parameters:
        interval - Interval in milliseconds.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Is the cyclic task running? This means that it was started through start() and was not stop() after that.
        Returns:
        true, if it's running

      • start

        void start()
        Run the task in an given interval.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop running cyclic task. Does nothing, if its not running.
